com.atakmap.android.cot

Class CotMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.atakmap.android.cot.CotMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent, CommsMapComponent.DirectCotProcessor, CotServiceRemote.CotEventListener, ReportingRate.Callback

    public class CotMapComponent
extends AbstractMapComponent
implements CotServiceRemote.CotEventListener, CommsMapComponent.DirectCotProcessor, ReportingRate.Callback
    Per-MapItem properties * entry - always "CoT"

      • addAdditionalDetail

        public void addAdditionalDetail(java.lang.String detailName,
                                CotDetail detail)
        Allows for a Self SA (PPLI) message to contain additional dynamically registered information. This detail can be modified by the client without having to add it again to the self marker.

      • getServerContacts

        public java.util.List<ServerContact> getServerContacts(java.lang.String connectString)
        Get list of server contacts, for servers that this device has connected to, at least once since ATAK startup. Does not reach out to server, rather checks cached contacts
        Parameters:
        connectString - Pass null to get contacts for all servers
        Returns:
